attributes.action: All new houses being built to have solar panels as standard.
attributes.additional_details: This is a huge waste of roof space which could be used to power AT LEAST the new homes and reduce our non-renewable energy consumption. It will be significantly cheaper and more efficient for the builders to install rather than individuals retrofitting later on.
attributes.background: There are thousands of new homes being built all over the country and the great majority of these don't have solar panels installed.
